languages.text: "Идут, грядут, за шагом шаг, последователи без глаз, глашатаи без голосов. За великим владыкой — его верный Апостол".
"They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."
languages.original_text: "Идут, грядут, за шагом шаг, последователи без глаз, глашатаи без голосов. За великим владыкой — его верный Апостол".

traits.locale_text: "They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."
"They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."
"They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."
"They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."
"They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."
"They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."

languages.text: "Sie kommen, Schritt für Schritt, die augenlosen Anhänger, die stimmlosen Boten. Der große Meister, und hinter ihm sein treuer Apostel."
languages.original_text: "They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."

traits.locale_text: "Sie kommen, Schritt für Schritt, die augenlosen Anhänger, die stimmlosen Boten. Der große Meister, und hinter ihm sein treuer Apostel."

languages.text: « Ils arrivent, pas à pas, les disciples aveugles, les hérauts sans voix. Le grand Maître et, derrière lui, son loyal Apôtre. »
languages.original_text: "They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."

traits.locale_text: « Ils arrivent, pas à pas, les disciples aveugles, les hérauts sans voix. Le grand Maître et, derrière lui, son loyal Apôtre. »

languages.text: “无眼的追随者与无声的传令者，他们彼此紧挨，即将到来。伟大的主人身后跟着他忠实的使徒。”
languages.original_text: "They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."

traits.locale_text: “无眼的追随者与无声的传令者，他们彼此紧挨，即将到来。伟大的主人身后跟着他忠实的使徒。”

languages.text: 「彼女達が来る、一歩また一歩と。瞳なき従者、声なき使者が。偉大なる主とその後ろにいる、忠実なアポスルよ」
languages.original_text: "They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女達が来る、一歩また一歩と。瞳なき従者、声なき使者が。偉大なる主とその後ろにいる、忠実なアポスルよ」

languages.text: «Vienen, paso a paso, los seguidores sin ojos, los heraldos sin voz. El gran maestro y detrás de él, su leal apóstol».
languages.original_text: "They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."

traits.locale_text: «Vienen, paso a paso, los seguidores sin ojos, los heraldos sin voz. El gran maestro y detrás de él, su leal apóstol».

languages.text: "Kör takipçileri ve dilsiz elçileriyle adım adım yaklaşmaktalar. Yüce Efendimiz geliyor, peşinden de sadık Apotr'ı."
languages.original_text: "They are coming, step after step, the eyeless followers, the voiceless heralds. The great Master and behind him, his loyal Apostle."

traits.locale_text: "Kör takipçileri ve dilsiz elçileriyle adım adım yaklaşmaktalar. Yüce Üstat geliyor, peşinden de sadık Havarisi."
